parameters.description: Excludes accounting changes such as balance adjustments from the modified date range.

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: Format - double. Returns customer records by latitude.

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: Format - double. Returns customer records by longitude.

parameters.name: phone
parameters.description: Returns customer records by phone number of contacts.

parameters.name: active
parameters.description:
Returns customer records by active status (only active items will be returned by default).\
Values: [True, Any, False]

parameters.name: externalDataApplicationGuid

get.description: Provides export feed for bookings
get.summary: Provides export feed for bookings

parameters.name: from
parameters.description:
Continuation token received from previous export request in "continueFrom" field.
When not specified, the export process starts from the beginning.\
Use custom date strings, e.g. "2020-01-01" to start the export process from the certain point in time.

parameters.name: includeRecentChanges
parameters.description:
Use "true" to start receiving the most recent changes quicker.
Note this may cause the same results appearing multiple times on consecutive requests.

What kind of items should be returned (only active items will be returned by default)\

parameters.description: Whether total count should be returned

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
Applies sorting by the specified field:\
"?sort=+FieldName" for ascending order,\
"?sort=-FieldName" for descending order.\
\
Available fields are: Id, ModifiedOn, CreatedOn.

patchMode.description:
External data patch mode.\
"Replace" (default) replaces all existing keys with new values. If job A has custom data with keys X and Y and this field only contains an item
with a key X, then custom data with a key Y on job A will be removed.\
"Merge" will only replace key X in the example above. Keys with null value will be deleted.

taxZoneId.description: ID of the location tax zone

customFields.description:
List of custom fields and their values. This list must describe the full list of custom fields on the location.
If location A has values for custom fields X and Y and this field only contains a model for custom field X, then
the value for custom field Y on location A will be removed.

tagTypeIds.description:
List of tag type IDs. If location has tag types X and Y and this field only contains tag type X, then Y will removed from the location.
If it is an empty list, all tags on the location will be removed.

externalData.description:
Optional model that contains a list of external data items
that should be updated to this Location.

pinToTop.description: Whether to pin location note to the top

addToCustomer.description: Whether to add the same note to the location's customer

page.description: From which page this output has started

pageSize.description: Page size for this query (i.e. how many records were requested to return)

hasMore.description: True if there are more records in the query than returned in this result

totalCount.description: Total count of records for this query (can optionally be populated)

data.description: The collection of result items, will never have more than PageSize items

phoneSettings.description: Phone settings of the location contact

modifiedOn.description: Date/time (in UTC) the contact was last modified

createdOn.description: Date/time (in UTC) the contact was created

id.description: ID of the custom field type

name.description: Name of the custom field type

dataType.description: The type custom field type (e.g. Text, Dropdown, or Numeric)

dataTypeOptions.description: The type custom field type (e.g. Text, Dropdown, or Numeric)

createdOn.description: DateTime (UTC) that customer record was created
